bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, Ground Control geometry, 26" comfort frame, formed tubes, forged dropouts w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: SR Suntour NEX-4110V2, alloy lower, Hi-Ten stanchions and steerer, coil/Mcu spring, preload adjust, 63mm travel
Ground Control adjustable rise, alloy head/quill, 2-bolt, 25.4mm clamp
Comfort riser bar, 60mm rise, 15-degree back sweep, 25.4mm
Alloy 4-finger, Kraton lever for twist shifter
Shimano FD-TX50, 31.8mm clamp, top swing, dual pull
Cartridge bearing, square spindle w/ crank stop right side, capless bolts
Comfort Pedal, composite body w/rubber top, sealed loose ball
Double sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR
Double-sealed, ground race, freewheel type, QR
Specialized Hemisphere w/ Flak Jacket, 26 TPI, 26x1.95"
Specialized Hemisphere w/ Flak Jacket protection, 26 TPI, 26x1.95"
A-1 Suspension Seatpost, alloy, 27.2mm w/ 3.8mm spring
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual, rack mount extensions
